data.title: Full Stack Developer
data.description: Full Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience building scalable web applications using React.js, Next.js, Node.js, Python, and Django. Skilled in RESTful API development, cloud services, performance optimization, and responsive UI/UX design. Experienced in Redux, WebSockets, TypeScript, Angular and database management. Passionate about building high-performance, user-centric applications.

responsibilities: Developed a scalable React.js based UI for online/offline doctor consultation booking platform
Implemented RESTful APIs, WebSockets, and JWT authentication for secure real-time interactions
Built reusable UI components and optimized performance to ensure a smooth user experience
Utilized AWS services (EC2, Lambda, RDS) enhancing application performance by 30%
Built React/Next.js startup website increasing site traffic by 30% and user engagement by 25%
Implemented Redux state management reducing API calls by 40% and improving responsiveness
Managed WooCommerce store achieving 15% sales increase through targeted optimization
Developed custom WordPress solutions expanding reach across multiple e-commerce platforms
